title: Messaging and channels
content:
# Telegram App Guide

## Navigation
- **Side Menu (Hamburger)**: Tap the **three horizontal lines** (top-left) to access your Profile, Settings, Contacts, and the integrated Wallet.
- **Chat Folders**: Switch between organized tabs like **"All Chats"**, **"CBSE PDF"**, or **"CLASS 12"** at the top of the chat list.
- **Compose**: Tap the floating **Pencil icon** (bottom right) to start a new message, group, or channel.

## Search
- **Global Search**: Tap the **Search icon** (top right) to find chats, channels, or media. The search screen offers tabs to filter by **Chats**, **Channels**, **Apps**, **Posts**, or **Media**.
- **Recent**: The search screen automatically displays your recently visited channels and contacts.

## Common Actions
- **Download Files**: Tap the **Down Arrow icon** on file attachments (like PDFs) to download them to your device.
- **Reactions**: Tap the small emojis (e.g., Heart, Fire) under a message to react to it.
- **Saved Messages**: Open the Side Menu and select **Saved Messages** to access your personal cloud storage for notes and files.
- **Mute Channels**: Use the large **Mute** (or Unmute) button at the bottom of a channel to control notifications.

## Tips
- **Wallet**: You can access the built-in crypto **Wallet** directly from the side menu.
- **Dark Mode**: Toggle the theme quickly by tapping the **Sun/Moon icon** in the top-right corner of the side menu.
- **Forwarding**: Messages often show a "Forwarded from..." tag, which links directly to the original source.
